pages.text: Runic Plates are powerful one-time use tools that can be used for a temporary buff. Some of which can be used to craft other more complex runic tools.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire a Runic Booster Plate, which can give you a jump boost.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire a Runic Dropper Plate, which can give you slow falling.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire a Runic Healing Plate, which can give you regeneration.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire a Runic Speed Plate, which can give you swiftness.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire a Runic Strength Plate, which can give you strength.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire a Runic Wisdom Plate, which can give you better deals.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire a Runic Fire Plate, which can conjure fire when used.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire a Runic Fire Plate, which can conjure water when used.
Above is the crafting recipe to acquire a Rune of the Template, which can be used to duplicate armor trims.
